amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow unemployed workers to use their Personal Reemployment Account funds to cover the borrower guarantee costs of Small Business Administration's 7(a) loans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered two printed in House Report 109-11 to allow unemployed workers to use their Personal Reemployment Account funds to cover the borrower guarantee costs of 7(a) loans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 221 (Roll no. 45).
